articles.title: The BBC may cry 'Little Britain', but Little Europe is where the real crisis lies - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: France and Germany are increasingly struggling to adapt to the modern world - not that you'd know it from following the UK media
articles.content:
Imagine, for a moment, that a major new defensive alliance centred on the crucial Asia-Pacific region had just been formed without British involvement, but featuring France instead.

articles.title: Aukus pact could push New Zealand to deepen relations with Europe and Pacific - The Guardian
